name: Nidish
description:
nidhogg ripoff i made for a project i had to do for class

how to play

player 1

  • W = jump
  • A = left
  • S = duck
  • D = right
  • Z = attack
  • T = blocking
  • R = throw weapon

player 2

  • Up Arrow = jump
  • Left Arrow = left
  • Down Arrow = duck
  • Right Arrow = right
  • O = attack
  • P = blocking
  • I = throw weapon
